Thullakotthita：1．Thullakotthita．-A township in the Kuru country．It was the birthplace of Ratthapāla，and it was there that the Buddha stayed during a tour among the Kurus （M．ii．54； ThagA．ii．30； AA．i．144）．It received its name from the fact of its granaries being always full （thullakottham，paripunnakotthāgāram）．It had plenteous crops．MA．ii．722； also Avadāna S．ii．118．

2．Thullakotthita．-A city in the time of Nārada Buddha，who preached there to Bhaddasāla and Vijitamitta，afterwards appointed as his chief disciples．BuA．154．
